sentences.en: a lordly disdain for the common man
He asked water, and she gave him milk; she brought forth butter in a lordly dish.
sentences.cn: 西西拉求水, 雅亿给了奶; 用珍贵的盘子奉上乳酪.

sentences.en: He dismissed people with a lordly gesture.

sentences.cn: 他那不可一世的样子惹得大家生了气.
他傲慢的态度令人讨厌.

sentences.en: I want you to know that lordly airs have come so far as I am concerned.
sentences.cn: 我要你放明白一点,你那种老爷派头对我来说已经用不上了.

sentences.en: I will lordly to everyone: I love you. mom.
sentences.cn: 我要向所有人大声宣布: 妈妈. 我爱你!

sentences.en: May prove as lordly and complete a thing.
sentences.cn: 就象把人践踏在脚下,一样是.

sentences.en: Maybe he brings news of our master, the lordly Vlysses.
sentences.cn: 他也许带来我们主人, 威严的尤利西斯的消息.

sentences.en: Owning a lordly mansion is his dream in his twenties.
sentences.cn: 在他二十几岁的年纪,拥有一座气派的大楼是他的梦想.

sentences.en: The family owns a lordly mansion.
sentences.cn: 那个家族拥有一座气派的大厦.

sentences.en: The voice was rich, lordly and Harvardish.
sentences.cn: 这声音浑厚, 威严,俨然是哈佛出身的气派.

sentences.en: The voice was rich, lordly, Harvardish, like all the boring radio comedians'imitations.
sentences.cn: 声音浑厚 、 威严, 俨然是哈佛出身的气派, 就跟无线电里所有的滑稽演员叫人已经听腻的模仿完全一样.

sentences.en: There were a few lordly poplars before the house.
sentences.cn: 有一排白杨像贵族一样矗立在房子前.

sentences.en: We don't feel disgusted and lordly when we stay with other people and color.
sentences.cn: 基本上,我们仍是愿意与其他色,与其他人共处一室而不会有丝毫厌恶及高傲的感觉.

words.tran_cn: 贵族气派，贵族式；高傲，威严
阁下；贵族身分（或权威）；统治

trans.tran_cn: 傲慢的， 高傲的，宏伟的， 堂皇的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a way that shows you think you are better or more important than other people
